title: Episode 6: The Negative Side of Positive Thinking
description:
What could be bad about thinking positively? That's the question we examine this week on The Psych Files.

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
content:encoded: What could be bad about thinking positively? That's the question we examine this week on The Psych Files. Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com
itunes:subtitle: There has been a lot of talk lately about The Secret and the Law of Attraaction. We learn more about positive thiking in this episode of The Psych Files.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
